This notebook is created so that the particpants of the workshop can follow along with the instructors. We will constantly update this notebook during the workshop to include answers to the questions asked during the workshop.

  - 10:45 - 12 pm  Functions

- Day2
  - 9:00 -10:30 R markdown basics
  - 10:45 -12 Knitr chunks
  - 1-2 pm  Rmarkdown themes, adding html and custom css styling
  - 2- 4 pm  A short project to bring it all together!
